exceptions.tactic: apply Forall2_cons_inv in H as [H1 H2].
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall (X Y : Type) (R : X -> Y -> Prop) (x : X) (l : list X) (y : Y) (m : list Y), Forall2 R (x :: l) (y :: m) <-> R x y /\\ Forall2 R l m" on hypothesis of type "Forall2 R ll (b :: mm)".

original: intros H. apply Forall2_cons_inv in H as [H1 H2]. exists H1. apply Forall2_app_inv_r in H2 as [l1 [l2 [H3 [H4 H5]]]]. exists l1. exists l2. auto.
